title: Sam Bennett on Tour non-selection: ‘First I was shocked, then I was upset … for sure I would have been in top shape.’
content:
The 2020 green jersey winner opens up about missing the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Sam Bennett on Tour non-selection: ‘First I was shocked, then I was upset … for sure I would have been in top shape.’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
